oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Religion
Bible: Old Testament
Judaism
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Manuscript of the Haggadah. Illustrated throughout with biblical scenes. Biblical verse or caption indicating the subject matter is written in small characters in a narrow oblong panel at the top and bottom of the patterned border in which the illuminations are contained. Illuminations are in gold and colour. Decorative margins: floral motifs, centaurs, archers, birds, animals and grotesques. Throughout the manuscript, initial words or phrases are written, in monumental characters, in letters of gold within finely ornamented panels.
